```{r}
.HermesDataPca <- setClass(
  Class = "AnyHermesDataAllPlots",
  contains = "AnyHermesData"
)

setMethod(
  f = "plot",
  signature = c(x = "AnyHermesDataAllPlots"),
  definition = function(object) {
    assert_that(
      is_hermes_data(object)
    )
  a <- draw_libsize_hist(object)
  b <- draw_libsize_qq(object)
  c <- draw_libsize_densities(object)
  d <- draw_nonzero_boxplot(object)
  e <- draw_genes_barplot(object)
  list(a, b, c, d, e)
  }
)
```
